item.title: Compare Summarization with On-Device model and Gemini free
item.description:
Use iPhone shortcuts actions “Use On-Device Model”, “Summarize” and request to Gemini free account to summarize the highlighted text from When AI writes almost all code, what happens to software engineering?

Prompt

Use the same prompt for On-Device model and Gemini

Summarize the input provided as Shortcut Input. The summary must be shorter than 200 words and formatted in a markdown code block. Ensure that all section titles within the summary are rendered as Level 2 Markdown Headings (starting with ##), not as simple bullet points or numbered lists.
